Runecraft

Runecraft是一个对于SMP的游戏修改，在不借助任何指令的情况下向游戏中增加了许多魔法元素。Runecraft是至今为止存活时间最长的Minecraft Mod，可追溯到遥远的Alpha时代。Runecraft拥有超过120个不同的符文且仍在继续被积极开发中。你需要的所有东西都在这一个沉浸式的魔法插件中。

魔法是通过“符文”来完成的，即在真实游戏世界中建造出的方块结构。这些符文可以创造独特的短时间工具附魔，传送器，隐形墙/门，甚至可以创造可移动传送的基地。


Runecraft is a gameplay modification for SMP, that adds magic to the game without any commands. Runecraft is the longest running Minecraft mod, dating back to the Alpha days. Runecraft boasts over 120 runes and is still under active development. Everything you need in one, immersive, magic plugin.

Magic is done through the form of "runes", significant shapes of materials laid out in the actual game world. These runes can create unique short-term tool enchants, teleporters, hidden walls/passageways, and even the ability to create mobile teleporting bases.


玩家可以建造的简易传送器，通过特定的方块组合来分辨目的地用于对付自然灾害的特定附魔在激活的时候可以在两种方块之间互换或揭露秘密通道的魔法方块红石兼容性：使符文可以被红石信号激活多世界支持：所有功能都完全与多世界服务器兼容无指令设置：Runecraft的设计使其在被安装时引起的麻烦被将至最低。安装即玩！简单配置：通过简单操作即可完全禁用一个符文，或禁止某个人使用一个符文可选权限组兼容性不需要客户端修改


Player built simple Teleporters that use unique combinations of blocks to identify destinationsSpecific enchantments for dealing with natural hazards (lava, floods, falling gravel)Magic blocks that flip between two blocks when you activate them, or reveal secret passagesRedstone compatibility: allowing runes to be activated by redstone signalsMulti-world support: all features are completely compatible with multiple-world serversCommandless setup: Runecraft is designed for minimum hassle in configuring it. plugin and go!Easy configuration: it's simple to disable a rune entirely, or a rune per person.Optional permissions compatibilityRequires no client modification





Runecraft因它的沉浸性而自豪，它不需要任何斜杠指令。所有的操作都可以在游戏中由玩家完成，建造符文来获得他们需要的效果。Runecraft因为它便于安装，并提供了各种各样可以完全从游戏内部视角体验的仿管理型功能与游戏机制，对于角色扮演，PvP与小型服务器来说都是个非常受欢迎的选择。


Runecraft prides itself on its immersive nature, with no need for any slash commands. Everything can be done in-game by players, constructing the runes to create the effects they're looking for. Runecraft is an extremely popular addon for roleplay, PVP, and small servers because of it's out of the box ability to just be installed and start running, and covering a variety of pseudo-administrative and gameplay mechanics from an entirely in game point of view.


配置，权限，命令

Runecraft曾经是一个原版变种，而不是一个Bukkit插件。因此它只有一个很基础的插件配置。配置文件名为“disabled-runes.txt”，这个文件位于服务端的根目录，即服务端JAR文件所在的目录。

它提供了一些很简单的功能：启用与禁用符文，禁止玩家使用某个符文或所有符文，以及修改Runecraft中方块的价值。


Runecraft used to be a vanilla modification, as opposed to a Bukkit plugin. As such it has a basic system for configuring the plugin from the get go. The configuration file is called "disabled-runes.txt" This file can be found in the root folder for your server, where the Craftbukkit JAR file can be found.

It's a very simple method for enabling and disabling features, banning players from using any runes, specific runes, and altering the value of blocks as far as Runecraft is concerned.


配置文件


# If you wish to disable a rune, remove the # before its name.
# This is the name printed when the rune is activated.
# List the name of a player to ban them from using magic (except existing teleporters).
# 
# Here are some extra options you can add to the list:
# Enable Black Magic, allows True Name skulls to be worn as helms allowing players to cast magic as if they were the true name owners
# Consume Dragon Eggs # by default dragon eggs are not consumed when runes use them
# Enable Travel Ink force teleporters and waypoints to be made of a specific material
# ink X # dermine the block type (X) to use for travel ink-- you must add this if you add the above
# disable multiworld travel Disables teleportation between worlds.
# Signature assignmentsm, this enables reserving Waypoints/Freight signature.
# You can have a block id followed by : and a metadata if you wish to specify that:
# You can also have a wildcard(*) to represent any block:
# Here is an example.:
# Signature Assignments
#     player name, north, east, south, west (This line must start with 1 or more spaces)
#     Amuxix, 35:5, 57, *, * 
# This would reserve all signature with green wool north, diamond block east and any block on south and west
# These all stack, allowing multiple signature groups per person.
# 
# Enable World Groups # Enables the restriction of TPs/FTPs/Zeerix Chest to only travel inside that group.
# Define the group like this, based on world folder name.
# WorldGroup world, world_nether, world_the_end
# WorldGroup creative, creative_2 
# With this enabled, worlds ungrouped will be freely accessible by other ungrouped worlds. 
# 
# use MultiGroupInk # To define teleport/FTP/etc inks that can escape world groups 
# MultiGroupInk 57 (would allow diamond runes to travel freely) 
# MultiGroupInk 7 (would allow bedrock runes to travel freely) 
# use MultiGroupRune to define teleport/FTP/etc runes can escape world groups 
# MultiGroupRune recall (would allow recall rune to travel freely between grouped worlds) 
# 
# --Below comes an auto generated list of all rune names. Simply remove the # to disable that rune.
salvation # Saves a faith island to a file in the main world folder.
redemption # loads a faith island from a file in the main world folder.
magmagel # Disabled by default because it allows players to create copious lava.

复制代码



# 如果你要禁用一个符文，移除它名称前面的#即可。
# 当某个符文被使用时显示出的就是它的名字。
# 将一个玩家的名字加入列表即可禁止他们使用魔法（除了已创建的传送器）。
# 
# 这里是一些可以添加到列表的额外选项：
# Enable Black Magic 允许True Name头颅被作为头盔装备，使玩家可以作为头颅主人身份使用魔法
# Consume Dragon Eggs # 默认情况下龙蛋在法阵启动时不会被消耗，加入本条即消耗
# Enable Travel Ink 强制使传送点与传送器必须使用特定材料搭建(称为 旅程墨)
# ink X # 表示旅程墨使用的方块种类(X) 如果你使用了上一项就必须加入这一项
# disable multiworld travel 禁用世界间传送
# Signature assignments 这一项会启用特定传送点/货运点符文签名保留。
# 你可以在方块ID后加上 : 并指定附加值：
# 你也可以使用星号(*)来表示任何方块：
# 这是一个例子：
# Signature Assignments
#     玩家名, 北, 东, 南, 西 (这一行前面要有至少一个空格)
#     Amuxix, 35:5, 57, *, * 
# 这一条会保留所有北方为绿色羊毛，南方为钻石方块，剩余方块为任意方块的签名
# 这些都可以叠加，使每个人可以拥有多个签名组。
# 
# Enable World Groups # 启动仅允许传送，信念传送以及Zeerix之箱在该地图组中传送的限制。
# 组定义方式是这样的，根据地图文件夹名。
# WorldGroup world, world_nether, world_the_end
# WorldGroup creative, creative_2 
# 如果开启了这项，未分组地图可以被从其他未分组地图自由访问。
# 
# use MultiGroupInk # 设定可以无视地图组限制的传送点，信念传送点等的旅行墨
# MultiGroupInk 57 (会允许通过钻石块搭建的符文进行自由传送) 
# MultiGroupInk 7 (会允许通过基岩搭建的符文进行自由传送) 
# use MultiGroupRune 设定可以无视地图组限制的传送/信念传送的符文
# MultiGroupRune recall (会允许使用Recall符文在地图间自由传送) 
# 
# --下面是一个自动生成的所有符文名称的列表。移除符文名称前的#可以禁用该符文。
salvation # 保存一个信念岛为主世界文件夹中的一个文件。
redemption # 加载一个位于主世界文件夹中的信念岛。
magmagel # 默认关闭，因为它会允许玩家放置大量岩浆。

复制代码


Runecraft的另一个配置文件是config.yml，比起disabled-runes.txt来说非常简单，提供了几个简单的配置，如果你不使用权限组插件，将前两项设置为true便可以启用它们，如果你想限制某些用户组的符文与传送权限，将它们设置为false


permissions:
  teleport: true
  runes: true
options:
  compass-old-north: false
  recall-weakness: false
复制代码

Recall Weakness (召回虚弱)是一个PvP选项，会在玩家使用Recall符文传送后给予它们30秒的虚弱药水效果。因为这个符文是个很好用的PvP逃脱选项，所以设计了这一项来进行了平衡。compass-old-north来自于当时Notch改变了服务器上北方的方向，造成了一些混乱。这个选项现在已经不需要了。

对于单独的权限来说，节点大概是下面这样

runecraft.runes
runecraft.teleport

runecraft.runes.phantomtorch
复制代码

每个符文都有一个与它关联的“runecraft.runes.??”权限节点，??代表符文名称，这里的符文名称没有且不首字母大写。

命令：无
